text: William Collins (15 November 1950 - 11 January 2023), better known by his stage name Billy McColl, was a Scottish actor. He was born in Hamilton, Scotland, McColl began his career in 1978. He had many different roles on British television shows such as Doctor Who, Hamish MacBeth, The Bill and Taggart. Billy McColl died on 11 January 2023, aged 72, in New York, USA. He was survived by his daughter, Maud. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Fife Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish movie actors
title: Billy McColl (actor)
